t = int(input())
while t > 0:
    n = int(input())
    print(n, end=' ')
    for i in range(1, n):
        print(i, end=' ')
    print()
    t -= 1

tcs = int(input())
while tcs > 0:
    n = int(input())
    el = [None for _ in range(0, n)]
    for index in range(1, n):
        el[index] = index
    el[0] = n
    for x in el:
        print(x, end=' ')
    print()
    tcs -= 1

for r in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    p = list(range(1, n + 1))
    for i in range(1, n):
        s = 0
        if p[i] % (i + 1) == 0 and i != n - 1:
            s = p[i]
            p[i] = p[i + 1]
            p[i + 1] = s
        elif p[i] % (i + 1) == 0:
            s = p[i]
            p[i] = p[i - 1]
            p[i - 1] = s
    result = ' '.join(map(str, p))
    print(result)

    print(' '.join(arr))

t = int(input())
for x in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    l = [x for x in range(1, n + 1)]
    for x in range(0, len(l), 2):
        if len(l) % 2 != 0 and x == len(l) - 1:
            (i, j) = (str(l[len(l) - 1]), str(l[1]))
            l[len(l) - 1] = j
            l[1] = i
            break
        (a, b) = (str(l[x]), str(l[x + 1]))
        l[x] = b
        l[x + 1] = a
    print(' '.join(l))

            break
        (a, b) = (str(l[x]), str(l[x + 1]))
